trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2017 Licensing and Purchase of purchasing Visual Studio Professional.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2017 Licensing and Purchase of purchasing Visual Studio Professional.

trans-unit.source: You can purchase Visual Studio Professional without an MSDN subscription or a Visual Studio subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can purchase Visual Studio Professional without an MSDN subscription or a Visual Studio subscription.

trans-unit.source:
Here are your options:
  • Buy a Visual Studio monthly subscription This is the most flexible way to access Visual Studio Professional and any new versions that are released while you stay subscribed.
trans-unit.target:
Here are your options:
  • Buy a Visual Studio monthly subscription This is the most flexible way to access Visual Studio Professional and any new versions that are released while you stay subscribed.

trans-unit.source: You also get access to Azure DevOps and Team Foundation Server.
trans-unit.target: You also get access to Azure DevOps and Team Foundation Server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see how to buy Visual Studio Professional and Visual Studio Enterprise cloud subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see how to buy Visual Studio Professional and Visual Studio Enterprise cloud subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: • Buy a standalone Visual Studio Professional 2019 license.
trans-unit.target: • Buy a standalone Visual Studio Professional 2019 license.
